CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 4, 1960, pg. 11 reads: "Home-A-Rama Fashions - Milliners Gloria Darcel and Belinda Blandburg (standing left to right) will be displaying their latest creations at The Courier - WAMO Home -A- Rama fashion show. Show models Gloria Sweeney and Velma Reid are receiving a pre-show fitting.  This is a Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four women, from left, seated: models Gloria Sweeney and Velma Reid; standing: milliners Gloria Darcel and Belinda Blandburg, posed in interior during pre-show fitting for The Courier-WAMO Home-A-Rama fashion show
